timeline.bodyText: Doesn't this give the same hashcode if you open 2 websockets because it takes the hashcode of the class itself? Maybe use hashcode of socketId?
timeline.author: Hilbrand

replies.bodyText: It's the hashCode of the instance and not of the class
replies.author: gerrieg
cpmeister
